WITH WELLS_FSTR_TF_DATA AS ( SELECT T1.BASE_YM /* 기준년월 */ , T1.BZ_HDQ_DV_CD /* 사업본부구분코드 */ , T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD /* 집금구분코드 */ , T1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , NVL( CASE WHEN T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('11', '12', '13') THEN 'L10' /* 할부(일시불) */ WHEN T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21', '23', '25', '26') THEN 'L20' /* 렌탈 */ WHEN T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22', '24') THEN 'L21' /* (금융)리스 */ WHEN T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('31', '32') THEN 'L31' /* 일반멤버십 */ WHEN T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '33' THEN 'L32' /* 홈케어멤버십 */ WHEN T2.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('61', '62', '63') THEN 'L60' /* 정기배송 */ END, T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD) AS BND_BIZ_DV_CD /* 채권업무구분코드 */ , T1.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , T1.CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , T1.CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ , NVL(UC_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT /* 미수금액 */ --2023.11.17 추가 , NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) AS DLQ_AMT /* 연체금액(=연체금액) */ --2023.11.17 수정 , NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0) AS THM_CHRAM_AMT /* 당월요금금액 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS DLQ_ADD_AMT /* 연체가산금액 */ , NVL(T1.RSG_BOR_AMT, 0) AS RSG_BOR_AMT /* 위약금액 */ FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 /* 채권계약기본 Table */ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T2 /* 계약상세 TABLE */ ON T2.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T2.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND T1.BZ_HDQ_DV_CD = #{bzHdqDvCd} /* 사업본부구분코드 : 20.WELLS */
AND CASE WHEN T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '09' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '03' THEN 1 /* 집금구분코드 : 09.위탁 AND 채권추심속성구분코드 : 03.위탁이관 */ WHEN T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '99' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '07' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_CD = '71' THEN 1 /* 집금구분코드 : 99.특수 AND 채권추심속성구분코드 : 07.대손확정 AND 채권추심속성사유코드 : 71.위탁 */ ELSE 2 END = 1
AND T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '11' /* 집금구분코드 : 09.위탁, 11.TF, 99.특수 */ AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '08' /* 채권추심속성구분코드 : 08.TF */
AND T1.BND_NW_DV_CD = #{bndNwDvCd} /* 신규구분 */
AND T1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /* 고객번호 */
AND T1.CST_NM = #{cstNm} /* 고객명 */
AND T1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /* 휴대지역전화번호 */
AND T1.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /* 휴대전화국번호암호화 */
AND T1.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /* 휴대개별전화번호 */
AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N') SELECT BASE_YM , BZ_HDQ_DV_CD , CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL TT1 WHERE TT1.PRTNR_NO = CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO ORDER BY TT1.FNL_MDFC_DTM DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_NM /* 집금담당자명 */ , COUNT(DISTINCT CST_NO) AS WO_CST_CT /* 전체 고객수 */ , COUNT(CNTR_NO) AS WO_CNTR_CT /* 전체 계약수 */ , SUM(UC_AMT) AS WO_UC_AMT /* 전체 미수금 */ --2023.11.17 추가 , SUM(DLQ_AMT + DLQ_ADD_AMT + THM_CHRAM_AMT) AS WO_OBJ_AMT /* 전체 대상금액 */ , SUM(DLQ_AMT) AS WO_DLQ_AMT /* 전체 연체금액 */ , SUM(THM_CHRAM_AMT) AS WO_THM_CHRAM_AMT /* 전체 당월금액 */ , SUM(DLQ_ADD_AMT) AS WO_DLQ_ADD_AMT /* 전체 연체가산금액 */ , SUM(RSG_BOR_AMT) AS WO_RSG_BOR_AMT /* 전체 위약금액 */ /* 렌탈 */ , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L20' THEN CST_NO ELSE NULL END) AS RENTAL_CST_CT , COUNT(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L20' THEN CNTR_NO ELSE NULL END) AS RENTAL_CNTR_CT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L20' THEN UC_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RENTAL_UC_AMT --렌탈 미수금 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L20' THEN (DLQ_AMT + DLQ_ADD_AMT + THM_CHRAM_AMT + RSG_BOR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) AS RENTAL_OBJ_AMT --렌탈 당월대상 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L20' THEN DLQ_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RENTAL_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L20' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RENTAL_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L20' THEN DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RENTAL_DLQ_ADD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L20' THEN RSG_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RENTAL_RSG_BOR_AMT /* 금융리스 */ , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L21' THEN CST_NO ELSE NULL END) AS LEASE_CST_CT , COUNT(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L21' THEN CNTR_NO ELSE NULL END) AS LEASE_CNTR_CT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L21' THEN UC_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS LEASE_UC_AMT --금융리스 미수금 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L21' THEN (DLQ_AMT + DLQ_ADD_AMT + THM_CHRAM_AMT + RSG_BOR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) AS LEASE_OBJ_AMT --금융리스 당월대상 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L21' THEN DLQ_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS LEASE_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L21' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS LEASE_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L21' THEN DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS LEASE_DLQ_ADD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L21' THEN RSG_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS LEASE_RSG_BOR_AMT /* 일반멤버십 */ , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L31' THEN CST_NO ELSE NULL END) AS MSH_CST_CT , COUNT(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L31' THEN CNTR_NO ELSE NULL END) AS MSH_CNTR_CT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L31' THEN UC_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS MSH_UC_AMT --일반멤버십 미수금 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L31' THEN (DLQ_AMT + DLQ_ADD_AMT + THM_CHRAM_AMT + RSG_BOR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) AS MSH_OBJ_AMT --일반멤버십 당월대상 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L31' THEN DLQ_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS MSH_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L31' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS MSH_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L31' THEN DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS MSH_DLQ_ADD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L31' THEN RSG_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS MSH_RSG_BOR_AMT /* 홈케어멤버십 */ , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L32' THEN CST_NO ELSE NULL END) AS HCR_CST_CT , COUNT(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L32' THEN CNTR_NO ELSE NULL END) AS HCR_CNTR_CT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L32' THEN UC_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS HCR_UC_AMT --홈케어멤버십 미수금 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L32' THEN (DLQ_AMT + DLQ_ADD_AMT + THM_CHRAM_AMT + RSG_BOR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) AS HCR_OBJ_AMT --홈케어 당월대상 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L32' THEN DLQ_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS HCR_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L32' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS HCR_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L32' THEN DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS HCR_DLQ_ADD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L32' THEN RSG_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS HCR_RSG_BOR_AMT /* 일시불 */ , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN CST_NO ELSE NULL END) AS SPAY_CST_CT , COUNT(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN CNTR_NO ELSE NULL END) AS SPAY_CNTR_CT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN UC_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_UC_AMT --일시불 멤버십 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN (DLQ_AMT + DLQ_ADD_AMT + THM_CHRAM_AMT + RSG_BOR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_OBJ_AMT --일시불 당월대상 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN DLQ_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_DLQ_ADD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L10' THEN RSG_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS SPAY_RSG_BOR_AMT /* 정기배송 */ , COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN CST_NO ELSE NULL END) AS RGLR_SPP_CST_CT , COUNT(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN CNTR_NO ELSE NULL END) AS RGLR_SPP_CNTR_CT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN UC_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_UC_AMT --정기배송 미수금 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN (DLQ_AMT + DLQ_ADD_AMT + THM_CHRAM_AMT + RSG_BOR_AMT) ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_OBJ_AMT --정기배송 당월대상 , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN DLQ_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_DLQ_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN THM_CHRAM_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_THM_CHRAM_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN DLQ_ADD_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_DLQ_ADD_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN BND_BIZ_DV_CD = 'L60' THEN RSG_BOR_AMT ELSE 0 END) AS RGLR_SPP_RSG_BOR_AMT FROM WELLS_FSTR_TF_DATA /* WELLS 위탁이관데이터 Virtual View */ GROUP BY BASE_YM, BZ_HDQ_DV_CD, CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO

SELECT T1.BASE_YM , T1.BZ_HDQ_DV_CD , T1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO , TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.UC_AMT, 0)), 'FM999,999,999,999') AS UC_AMT /* 미수금 */ , TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0)), 'FM999,999,999,999') AS TRG_AMT /* 대상금액 */ , TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0)), 'FM999,999,999,999') AS DLQ_AMT /* 연체금액 */ , TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0)), 'FM999,999,999,999') AS THM_CHRAM_AMT /* 당월금액 */ , TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0)), 'FM999,999,999,999') AS DLQ_ADD_AMT /* 연체가산금액 */ , TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(T1.RSG_BOR_AMT, 0)), 'FM999,999,999,999') AS RSG_BOR_AMT /* 위약금액 */ FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 WHERE T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND T1.BZ_HDQ_DV_CD = #{bzHdqDvCd}
AND CASE WHEN T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '09' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '03' THEN 1 /* 집금구분코드 : 09.위탁 AND 채권추심속성구분코드 : 03.위탁이관 */ WHEN T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '99' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '07' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_CD = '71' THEN 1 /* 집금구분코드 : 99.특수 AND 채권추심속성구분코드 : 07.대손확정 AND 채권추심속성사유코드 : 71.위탁 */ ELSE 2 END = 1
AND T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '11' /* 집금구분코드 : 09.위탁, 11.TF, 99.특수 */ AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '08' /* 채권추심속성구분코드 : 08.TF */
AND T1.BND_NW_DV_CD = #{bndNwDvCd} /* 신규구분 */
AND T1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /* 고객번호 */
AND T1.CST_NM = #{cstNm} /* 고객명 */
AND T1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO = #{cralLocaraTno} /* 휴대지역전화번호 */
AND T1.MEXNO_ENCR = #{mexnoEncr} /* 휴대전화국번호암호화 */
AND T1.CRAL_IDV_TNO = #{cralIdvTno} /* 휴대개별전화번호 */
AND T1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO = #{clctamPrtnrNo} /* 집금담당자번호 */
AND T1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO IS NULL /* 집금담당자번호 */
AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY BZ_HDQ_DV_CD, BASE_YM, CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO

SELECT F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'CLCO_CD', T1.CLCO_CD) AS FSTR_CO_NM /* 위탁사명 */ , T1.CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO /* 집금파트너번호 */ , (SELECT PRTNR_KNM FROM TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL TT1 WHERE TT1.PRTNR_NO = CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO ORDER BY TT1.FNL_MDFC_DTM DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) AS CLCTAM_PRTNR_NM /* 집금담당자명 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'CLCTAM_DV_CD', T4.CLCTAM_DV_CD) AS CLCTAM_DVD /* 직전담당집금 */ , T4.PRTNR_KNM /* 직전담당자 */ , T1.CNTR_NO /* 계약번호 */ , T1.CNTR_SN /* 계약일련번호 */ , T1.CST_NM /* 고객명 */ , T1.CST_NO /* 고객번호 */ , NVL( CASE WHEN T3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('11', '12', '13') THEN 'L10' /* 할부(일시불) */ WHEN T3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('21', '23', '25', '26') THEN 'L20' /* 렌탈 */ WHEN T3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('22', '24') THEN 'L21' /* (금융)리스 */ WHEN T3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('31', '32') THEN 'L31' /* 일반멤버십 */ WHEN T3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = '33' THEN 'L32' /* 홈케어멤버십 */ WHEN T3.SELL_TP_DTL_CD IN ('61', '62', '63') THEN 'L60' /* 정기배송 */ END, T1.BND_BIZ_DV_CD) AS PD_NM /* 상품구분=채권업무구분코드 */ , T1.DLQ_MCN /* 연체개월 */ , NVL(T1.UC_AMT, 0) AS UC_AMT /* 미수금 */ --2023.11.17 추가 , NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) + NVL(DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) + NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0) AS TRG_AMT /* 대상금액 (=연체금액 + 연체가산금액 + 당월요금) */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_AMT, 0) AS DLQ_AMT /* 연체금액(=연체금액) */ --2023.11.17 수정 , NVL(T1.THM_CHRAM_AMT, 0) AS THM_CHRAM_AMT /* 당월요금 */ , NVL(T1.DLQ_ADD_AMT, 0) AS DLQ_ADD_AMT /* 연체가산금 */ , NVL(T1.RSG_BOR_AMT, 0) AS RSG_BOR_AMT /* 위약금액 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_EDU', 'BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD', T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD) AS BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_NM /* 채권추심속성구분 */ --2023.11.17 추가 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_EDU', 'BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_CD', T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_CD) AS BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_NM /* 채권추심속성사유 */ --2023.11.17 추가 , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LWM_TP_CD', T2.LWM_TP_CD) AS LWM_TP /* 법조치유형 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'LWM_DTL_TP_CD', T2.LWM_DTL_TP_CD) AS LWM_DTL_TP_CD /* 법조치상세 */ , T2.LWM_DT /* 법조치일자 */ , T2.DFLT_DT /* 채불등록일자 */ , (SELECT RNADR FROM TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS WHERE ADR_ID = (SELECT ADR_ID FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS WHERE CST_NO=T1.CST_NO) AND DTA_DL_YN != 'Y') AS ADDR /* 고객 주소 */ , T1.BASE_YM /* 기준년월 */ , T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD /* 집금구분코드 */ , T1.FNL_MDFC_DTM /* 최종수정일시 */ FROM TB_CBBO_BND_CNTR_BAS T1 /* 채권계약기본 TABLE */ LEFT OUTER JOIN ( --고객의 법조치 내역 중 가장 최근값 조회 SELECT ST1.CUJ_CD , ST1.INDNO , ST1.CST_NO , ST1.CNTR_NO , ST1.CNTR_SN --법원코드, 사건번호, 고객번호 .... , ST1.LWM_TP_CD , ST1.LWM_DTL_TP_CD , ST1.LWM_DT , ST1.DFLT_DT --법조치유형, 법조치상세유형, 법조치일자, 채무불이행일자 , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY ST1.CST_NO ORDER BY ST1.LWM_DT DESC) ROW_NUM FROM TB_CBBO_BND_LWM_IZ ST1 --법조치내역 Table ) T2 ON T2.CST_NO = T1.CST_NO AND T2.ROW_NUM = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T3 /* 계약상세 TABLE */ ON T3.CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND T3.CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBBO_CLCTAM_PRTNR_DTL T4 /* 집금파트너상세 TABLE */ ON T4.PRTNR_NO = T1.BF_CLCTAM_PRTNR_NO WHERE T1.BASE_YM = #{baseYm} AND T1.BZ_HDQ_DV_CD = #{bzHdqDvCd}
AND CASE WHEN T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '09' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '03' THEN 1 /* 집금구분코드 : 09.위탁 AND 채권추심속성구분코드 : 03.위탁이관 */ WHEN T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '99' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '07' AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_RSON_CD = '71' THEN 1 /* 집금구분코드 : 99.특수 AND 채권추심속성구분코드 : 07.대손확정 AND 채권추심속성사유코드 : 71.위탁 */ ELSE 2 END = 1
AND T1.CLCTAM_DV_CD = '11' /* 집금구분코드 : 09.위탁, 11.TF, 99.특수 */ AND T1.BND_CLCTN_PRP_DV_CD = '08' /* 채권추심속성구분코드 : 08.TF */
AND T1.BND_NW_DV_CD = #{bndNwDvCd} /* 신규구분 */
AND T1.CST_NO = #{cstNo} /* 고객번호 */
